name: Senseless (TM_Yee)
description:
A short game made in a week for the Jar Jam S2.

The theme of the jam was "senseless", so I took it and ran with it. The player starts off alone, with only one sense available to them: touch. The goal of the game is to kill enemies and collect souls to unlock all five senses and escape the cold, dark room you're trapped in.
